Name: Maximize Velocity
Description: Maximize average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Sprint Duration
Description: Minimize the length of each sprint in days

Name: Maximize Feature Delivery
Description: Maximize number of Features delivered per release

Name: Minimize Bug Severity
Description: Minimize average severity of Blockers per sprint

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Maximize percentage utilization of Team members

Name: Minimize Budget Overrun
Description: Minimize amount by which spending exceeds Budget at project end

Name: Minimize Task Rework
Description: Minimize number of Tasks moved backward on the Scrum Board

Name: Maximize Release Frequency
Description: Maximize number of Release Plans executed per year

Name: Minimize Unplanned Work
Description: Minimize count of unplanned Tasks added mid-sprint
